thread.section_title: Saint Dominique Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Beautiful hotel
thread.title_full: Beautiful hotel - Review of Saint Dominique Hotel, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: SabrinaSpectre
title: Beautiful hotel
text:
Really loved staying at this hotel. All the staff were lovely and fulfilled each one of my requests. It's a boutique hotel, so don't expect large rooms, but were perfect for my stay. Perfect location too as its nearby big sights and also lots of places to ear.
Room Tip: I had a room on the 5th Floor facing the street and it wasn't too noisy. See more room tips
